infodynamics.measures.discrete

Class CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.discrete.CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete

  • public class CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete
extends java.lang.Object
    A combined calculator for the active information, entropy rate and entropy.

    This class is preliminary, so the Javadocs are incomplete -- please see ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete, EntropyRateCalculatorDiscrete and EntropyCalculatorDiscrete for documentation on the corresponding functions and typical usage pattern.

    TODO Make this inherit from SingleAgentMeasureDiscreteInContextOfPastCalculator like ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete and fix the Javadocs
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public void initialise(int history,
              int base)
        Initialise calculator, preparing to take observation sets in Should be called prior to any of the addObservations() methods. You can reinitialise without needing to create a new object.

      • addObservations

        public void addObservations(int[][] states)
        Add observations in to our estimates of the pdfs. This call suitable only for homogeneous agents, as all agents will contribute to single pdfs.
        Parameters:
        states -

      • addObservations

        public void addObservations(int[][] states,
                   int col)
        Add observations for a single agent of the multi-agent system to our estimates of the pdfs. This call should be made as opposed to addObservations(int states[][]) for computing active info for heterogeneous agents.
        Parameters:
        states -

      • computeAverageLocalOfObservations

        public void computeAverageLocalOfObservations()
        Computes the average local values from the observed values which have been passed in previously. Access the averages, mins and maxes from the accessor methods.

      • computeLocalFromPreviousObservations

        public CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete.CombinedActiveEntRateLocalSTResults computeLocalFromPreviousObservations(int[][] states)
        Computes local values for the given states, using pdfs built up from observations previously sent in via the addObservations method This method to be used for homogeneous agents only
        Parameters:
        states -
        Returns:

        public CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete.CombinedActiveEntRateLocalResults computeLocal(int history,
                                                                                     int base,
                                                                                     int[][] states,
                                                                                     int col)
        Standalone routine to compute local values for one agent in a 2D spatiotemporal array of the states of agents Return a 2D spatiotemporal array of local values. First history rows are zeros This method should be used for heterogeneous agents
        Parameters:
        history - - parameter k
        base - - base of the states
        states - - 2D array of states
        col - - column number of the agent in the states array
        Returns:
